title: Monday Post Show (11-8-21)
itunes:title: Monday Post Show (11-8-21)
description:
Bobby brings you on a journey to hear what it’s like to record videos after the show. We also get an update from Raymundo about whether he will be attending the Soul Train Awards in New York. Amy talks about a question she had on a therapy servant. She has Bobby answer some for her to see how she ranks against how she filled it out. Eddie calls out Raymundo for being a liar. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
